title: Claudio Puglisi
text: Claudio Puglisi (born 1960 in <a href="Voghera">Voghera</a>, Italy) is an Italian former <a href="association%20football">football</a> referee and linesman. He was implicated in the <a href="2006%20Serie%20A%20scandal">2006 Serie A scandal</a> for his contacts with Leonardo Meani before an April 2005 match with <a href="A.C.%20ChievoVerona">Chievo Verona</a>.
